mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sports.schedule_tbl inner join tournament_tbl on schedule_tbl.schedule_tour=tournament_tbl.tournament_id inner join (team_tbl inner join profile_tbl on team_tbl.team_id=profile_tbl.id_team) on team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team1 or team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team2 order by schedule_tbl.schedule_id DESC

SELECT * FROM sports.schedule_tbl inner join tournament_tbl on schedule_tbl.schedule_tour=tournament_tbl.tournament_id inner join (team_tbl inner join profile_tbl on team_tbl.team_id=profile_tbl.id_team) on ( team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team1 or team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team2) left join goal_tbl on schedule_tbl.schedule_id=goal_tbl.id_schedule where schedule_tour=${idTour}

SELECT * FROM sports.schedule_tbl inner join tournament_tbl on schedule_tbl.schedule_tour=tournament_tbl.tournament_id inner join (team_tbl inner join profile_tbl on team_tbl.team_id=profile_tbl.id_team) on ( team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team1 or team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team2) left join goal_tbl on schedule_tbl.schedule_id=goal_tbl.id_schedule where schedule_id=${idSchedule} order by schedule_tbl.schedule_start DESC
SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM schedule_tbl where (schedule_tbl.schedule_team1=${idTeam} or schedule_tbl.schedule_team2=${idTeam}) and schedule_tbl.schedule_status=2
SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM schedule_tbl where (schedule_tbl.schedule_team1=${idTeam} or schedule_tbl.schedule_team2=${idTeam})and schedule_tbl.schedule_adraw and schedule_tbl.schedule_status=2
SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM schedule_tbl where schedule_tbl.schedule_winner=${idTeam} ;

SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM schedule_tbl where (schedule_tbl.schedule_team1=${idTeam} or schedule_tbl.schedule_team2=${idTeam} ) and schedule_tbl.schedule_tour=${idTour} and schedule_tbl.schedule_status=2 and schedule_tbl.schedule_tour=${idTour};
SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM schedule_tbl where schedule_tbl.schedule_tour=${idTour} and schedule_tbl.schedule_winner=${idTeam} ;

SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM schedule_tbl where (schedule_tbl.schedule_team1=${idTeam} or schedule_tbl.schedule_team2=${idTeam} ) and schedule_tbl.schedule_tour=${idTour} and schedule_tbl.schedule_adraw=1 ;

SELECT * FROM sports.schedule_tbl inner join tournament_tbl on schedule_tbl.schedule_tour=tournament_tbl.tournament_id inner join (team_tbl inner join profile_tbl on team_tbl.team_id=profile_tbl.id_team) on ( team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team1 or team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team2 )left join goal_tbl on schedule_tbl.schedule_id=goal_tbl.id_schedule where schedule_status=${status} order by schedule_tbl.schedule_start

SELECT * FROM sports.schedule_tbl inner join tournament_tbl on schedule_tbl.schedule_tour=tournament_tbl.tournament_id inner join team_tbl on ( team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team1 or team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team2 ) where( schedule_tbl.schedule_team1=${idTeam} or schedule_tbl.schedule_team2=${idTeam}) and schedule_tbl.schedule_status=2 order by schedule_tbl.schedule_start desc ;

SELECT * FROM sports.schedule_tbl inner join tournament_tbl on schedule_tbl.schedule_tour=tournament_tbl.tournament_id inner join team_tbl on ( team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team1 or team_tbl.team_id=schedule_tbl.schedule_team2 ) where( schedule_tbl.schedule_team1=${idTeam} or schedule_tbl.schedule_team2=${idTeam}) and schedule_tbl.schedule_status!=2 order by schedule_tbl.schedule_start desc ;
